control_attributes.control_description: The organization disables, when not intended for use, wireless networking capabilities internally embedded within information system components prior to issuance and deployment.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system implements information search and retrieval services that enforce [Assignment: organization-defined information sharing restrictions].
